name: Clown Of Duty
description:
Behold, a love letter to Clownfield fans... Welcome to the new era of Clown Warfare, the Clown of Duty.

Clown of Duty is a medium-scale boots on the ground multiplayer first-person shooter emphasizing quick combat through coordination, tactics and planning. Head on alone or team up with your friends in a battle against opposite forces. Pick your side, play as Spetsnaz or Delta Force member and overcome the battlefield.

Riverside Sports brings fans state-of-the-art gameplay, with all-new gun handling, improved AI, desired weapon and player customization system and a suite of other gameplay innovations that elevate the experience to the new level of Clown Warfare experience.

Experience the fast-paced contact with enemy, beautifully hand-crafted locations, gunsmithing, player customization and more - only in Clown of Duty!
